turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Would you please order me a coffee from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly. Which location would you like me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one at Stapley and the 60 would be best.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. What would you like me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an iced pumpkin spiced latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tall would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And your choice of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Coconut milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want whipped cream on that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure why not.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so that is an iced pumpkin spice latte, tall, with coconut milk, and whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually could you change that to no whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly.  Are you still good with the coconut milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Coconut milk will be great thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok let me just double check the whole order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Go ahead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You want one tall iced pumpkin spice latte with coconut milk and no whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have placed your order and it will be available for you to pick up shortly at the Starbucks at Stapley and the 60.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The receipt will be sent to your mobile via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you for your help.
